resources.string: Civil War: \n South Carolina vs Virginia
Start Screen: Enter the number of battle locations you woud like to place on each side (5 to 10). \nThen click the war you\'d like to play (Civil War or World War 2)
Game Play: Touch a location on the map where you think a battle may have occurred. If you\'re correct, a location will appear. If you are incorrect, the turn will switch to the other player.
How to Win: Victory is achieved by destroying all the locations of your opponent, or if they surender.
Play And Learn: You can click on the infowindow of the locations that have been found to learn more about the battle that happened at those loctions.
